tool_description: Convert any URL into a PDF, PNG or JPG file
name: URL to PDF PNG or JPG
title: URL to PDF PNG or JPG
tool_name: URL to PDF PNG or JPG

api_list.name: Convert URL to PDF, PNG or JPEG
api_list.description: Convert URL into a PDF, PNG or JPEG file

required_parameters.name: layout
required_parameters.description: Layout of page. Either portrait or landscape

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Return format. pdf, png or jpeg

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL to convert. Use URL encoding when needed.

required_parameters.name: margin
required_parameters.description: Margin used for top, bottom, left and right. 0.1 should work for most.
